Content-Type: text/plain; charset=UTF-8

OOC:  I've been away a while, but I've skimmed over what's happened.  Stop
me if I make an obvious error.

BIC:

The base finally felt like home; as much as a mineshaft fortress could.  The
entrance of the base was more or less repaired; they replaced the doors and
found replacement parts for the defense systems and shields.

Setting the last of his belongings on a shelf in the commander's office, he
wondered what had become of the previous maximal commander.

Accessing the radio panel on his desk, he tuned to maximal bands and picked
up the microphone.

"This is Lord Perseus to all maximals and allies.    What is your status?"

Tag: Any maximal with a long range radio

--00c09f8c26051abdbb04858078e3
Content-Type: text/html; charset=UTF-8
